greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f.: x*cos(log(1+x)).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
mathematica: With[{nmax = 30}, CoefficientList[Series[x*Cos[Log[1 + x]], {x, 0, nmax}], x]*Range[0, nmax]!] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 22 2018 *)
program: (PARI) x='x+O('x^30); concat([0], Vec(serlaplace(x*cos(log(1+x))))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 22 2018
(MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:= [0] cat Coefficients(R!(x*Cos(Log(1+x)))); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 22 2018
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
ext: Extended with signs by _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 15 1997
